###TeamViewer - the All-In-One Software for Remote Support and Home Office

With TeamViewer, you can control computers remotely from your Chromebook or Chrome browser in an easy, fast and secure way, as if you were sitting right in front of them.
Provide support via Chrome or access your office PC.

##Features
* Access your computers and contacts and connect to them 
* Connect to other devices by using ID and password 
* Multimonitor support 
* Smooth operation - even behind firewalls
* Chat during the session
* …and much more
	
**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/teamviewer-chrome/readme.md)**
author: TeamViewer
